name: Hell Cleansing
description:
Hell Cleansing

Google Chrome is recommended for this game to work properly

This is a test of Construct3 3D capabilities. It includes a custom made raycasting simulation.

Title Image and cutscene concepts were generated with Stable Diffusion

Music: Torn Flesh -  by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=58PCM-x7jlg
